description: From Middle English answeryngly, answeryngli, answeringli, equivalent to answering +â€Ž -ly.

adverbs.description: answeringly (comparative more answeringly, superlative most answeringly)

entries.meaning: In a way that answers; so as to answer; in reply.
examples: There was a slight tremor in his voice, that thrilled, answeringly, a chord in the heart of his questioner.
